name: Binary. (itch)
description:
The insane combo action game for Combat manias.

Warning

Currently no tutorials and Japanese language only. This will be updated.

Controller Supports

Binary. is currently supports only gamepad below.

  • PS4 Dual Shock
  • XBox 360 Controller
  • XBox One Controller
Tutorials

https://twitter.com/dr40san/status/1459442246529404931?s=20

Basics.

LStick: Move
RStick: Camera
Cross: Jump
Triangle: Melee attack 
Square: Gunfire attack
Circle: Blink
R1: Lockon targets
L2/R2: Evade
L1: Special Attack
D-pad: Arts Attack
L3/R3: Change target

Advanced.

Arts attack can fire by D-pad, also you can use quick command.

Quick Command:

R1 + LStick(forward/backward) + Cross
R1 + LStick(forward/backward) + Square
